name: The_Last_of_USS_fan_game
description:
This is an infinite runner with a twist, where you follow a pattern of code to trigger

actions to the protagonist,  say like jump , combat , speedup using code language

cheat sheet: XD

1)1,2 --->Combat

2)3,1--->jump active

3)5,2--->speedup

4)7,0-->reset and much more

this game is still in development

this is an Alpha look to the game 

Have fun Playing it ;D
